Adaptable.name: Adaptable
Adaptable.description: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-racial-abilities.Adaptable]{Adaptable} (1): The race has great variation among its people and cultures. Characters start with a free Novice @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor01charac.JournalEntryPage.01edges000000000]{Edge} of their choice (and must meet all the Edge’s Requirements).

Additional Action.name: Additional Action
Additional Action.description: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-racial-abilities.Additional Action]{Additional Action} (1): The being has additional appendages, enhanced reflexes, or exceptional eye-hand coordination. He may ignore 2 points of @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor03rules0.JournalEntryPage.03multiactions00]{Multi-Action} penalties each turn.

Attribute Increase.name: Attribute Increase
Attribute Increase.description: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-racial-abilities.Attribute Increase]{Attribute Increase} (U): During character creation, the species increases a particular @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor01charac.JournalEntryPage.01traits00000000]{attribute} (Agility, Smarts, Spirit, Strength, or Vigor) one die type. This increases the Trait's maximum by one as well.

Attribute Penalty.name: Attribute Penalty
Attribute Penalty.description: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-racial-abilities.Attribute Penalty]{Attribute}Penalty (Once per Attribute): One @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor01charac.JournalEntryPage.01traits00000000]{attribute} (but not its linked skills) suffers a –1 penalty. For 3 points, it suffers a –2 penalty. If @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor01charac.JournalEntryPage.01traits00000000]{Strength}, this applies to damage as well.

Aquatic.name: Aquatic
Aquatic.description: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-racial-abilities.Aquatic]{Aquatic/Semi-Aquatic} (1): For one point the character is semi-aquatic and can hold his breath for 15 minutes before checking for drowning. For two, he’s native to the water. He cannot drown in oxygenated liquid and moves his full Pace when swimming (see @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor03rules0.JournalEntryPage.03movement000000]{Movement}).

Armor.name: Armor
Armor.description: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-racial-abilities.Armor]{Armor} (3): The species has a thick hide or is encrusted in solid material like scaly plating or even rock. This grants @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor02gear00.JournalEntryPage.02armor000000000]{Armor} +2 each time it’s taken.

Big.name: Big
Big.description: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-racial-abilities.Big]{Big} (1): The race is particularly large in a world where most others aren’t. He subtracts 2 from @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor01charac.JournalEntryPage.01traits00000000]{Trait} rolls when using equipment that wasn’t specifically designed for his race and cannot wear their armor or clothing. Equipment, food, and clothing cost double the listed price.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-racial-abilities.Bite]{Bite} (1): The race has fangs that cause Strength+d4 damage. See @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor03rules0.JournalEntryPage.03naturalweapo00]{Natural Weapons} for more information.

Doesn't Breathe.name: Doesn't Breathe
Doesn't Breathe.description: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-racial-abilities.Doesn't Breathe]{Doesn't Breathe} (1): The species does not breathe. Individuals aren’t affected by inhaled @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor04theadv.JournalEntryPage.04poison00000000]{toxins}, can’t @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor04theadv.JournalEntryPage.04drowning000000]{drown}, and don’t suffocate in a vacuum. (They may still freeze, however.)

Burrowing.name: Burrowing
Burrowing.description: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-racial-abilities.Burrowing]{Burrowing} (1): The species can burrow into loose earth and move through it at half normal Pace (he cannot run). He cannot normally be attacked while burrowing, and can attempt to surprise opponents who didn’t see him coming by making an opposed @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.Stealth]{Stealth} vs. @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.Notice]{Notice} roll. If successful, the burrower adds +2 to his attack and damage rolls that round, or +4 with a raise (he has @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor03rules0.JournalEntryPage.03thedrop0000000]{The Drop}).

Cannot Speak.name: Cannot Speak
Cannot Speak.description: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-racial-abilities.Cannot Speak]{Cannot Speak} (1): The race has no vocal cords or cannot form the sounds made by most other races. He can communicate with members of his own race naturally (through song, pheromones, body language, etc.). Other races can’t speak his “language” but may learn to understand him if they take the proper @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.Language]{Language} skill. The species can hear and understand other typical languages and may communicate via electronic devices or the like.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-racial-abilities.Claws]{Claws} (1): The race has claws that cause Str+d4 damage. One more point may be spent to increase their damage to Strength+d6, and/or another to add @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor02gear00.JournalEntryPage.02armorpiercin00]{AP} 2. See @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor03rules0.JournalEntryPage.03naturalweapo00]{Natural Weapons}.

Construct.name: Construct
Construct.description: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-racial-abilities.Construct]{Construct} (1): Constructs are artificial beings made of inorganic material. They add +2 to recover from being @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor03rules0.JournalEntryPage.03damageeffect00]{Shaken}, ignore one level of @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor03rules0.JournalEntryPage.03damageeffect00]{Wound modifiers}, don’t breathe, and are immune to disease and poison. @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor03rules0.JournalEntryPage.03damageeffect00]{Wounds} must be mended via the @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.Repair]{Repair} skill. Each attempt takes one hour per current @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor03rules0.JournalEntryPage.03damageeffect00]{Wound} level and ignores the @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor03rules0.JournalEntryPage.03healing0000000]{"The Golden Hour"}. Many Constructs have the Dependency Negative Racial Ability (reflecting their need for a power source).

Dependency.name: Dependency
Dependency.description: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-racial-abilities.Dependency]{Dependency} (1): The race must consume or have contact with some sort of relatively common substance for an hour out of every 24. Creatures from water-based worlds, for example, might need to immerse themselves in water; plant people might need sunlight. Without the required contact, a character becomes @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor03rules0.JournalEntryPage.03fatigue0000000]{Fatigued} each day until @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor03rules0.JournalEntryPage.03damageeffect00]{Incapacitated}. A day after that, they perish. Each hour spent recovering with the appropriate substance restores a level of Fatigue.

Edge.name: Edge
Edge.description: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-racial-abilities.Edge]{Edge} (U): All members of this race have the same innate @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor01charac.JournalEntryPage.01edges000000000]{Edge} chosen from those available in the setting. Unlike Adaptable, this ability ignores Requirements except other @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor01charac.JournalEntryPage.01edges000000000]{Edges}. Each @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor01charac.JournalEntryPage.01advancement000]{Rank} beyond Novice costs an additional point to a maximum of Heroic Rank (5).

Flight.name: Flight
Flight.description: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-racial-abilities.Flight]{Flight} (1): The species can fly at @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor03rules0.JournalEntryPage.03movement000000]{Pace} 6 (or 12 for 4 points) and “run” for extra movement as usual. For 6 points, the being can fly at 24 and may “run” for 2d6″ of additional movement. Maneuvering uses the @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.Athletics]{Athletics} skill. Racial flight presumes some kind of wings which can be targeted or fouled (a @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor03rules0.JournalEntryPage.03boundandenta00]{Bound or Entangled} character cannot fly).

Frail.name: Frail
Frail.description: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-racial-abilities.Frail]{Frail} (2): The creature is less durable than most. Reduce its @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor01charac.JournalEntryPage.01characters0000]{Toughness} by 1.

Hardy.name: Hardy
Hardy.description: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-racial-abilities.Hardy]{Hardy} (1): A second @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor03rules0.JournalEntryPage.03damageeffect00]{Shaken} result in combat does not cause a @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor03rules0.JournalEntryPage.03damageeffect00]{Wound}.

Hindrance.name: Hindrance
Hindrance.description: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-racial-abilities.Hindrance]{Hindrance} (U): The race has an inherent Minor @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor01charac.JournalEntryPage.01hindrances0000]{Hindrance} for 1 point, or a Major Hindrance for 2. This doesn’t affect the ability to choose other Hindrances during character creation.

Horns.name: Horns
Horns.description: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-racial-abilities.Horns]{Horns} (1): The being has a horn or horns that cause Str+d4 @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor03rules0.JournalEntryPage.03dealingdamag00]{damage} (or Str+d6 for 2 points). See @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor03rules0.JournalEntryPage.03naturalweapo00]{Natural Weapons} for more information.

Immune to Poison or Disease.name: Immune to Poison or Disease
Immune to Poison or Disease.description: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-racial-abilities.Immune to Poison or Disease]{Immune to Poison or Disease} (2): The species is immune to @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor04theadv.JournalEntryPage.04poison00000000]{poison} or @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor04theadv.JournalEntryPage.04disease0000000]{disease} (your choice). It may be taken twice for both effects.

Infravision.name: Infravision
Infravision.description: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-racial-abilities.Infravision]{Infravision} (1): The creature “sees” heat, either through eyes or other sensory organs. This halves @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor03rules0.JournalEntryPage.03illumination00]{illumination} penalties when attacking warm targets (including @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor05powers.JournalEntryPage.05powers00000000]{invisible} beings).

Leaper.name: Leaper
Leaper.description: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-racial-abilities.Leaper]{Leaper} (1): The character can jump twice as far as listed under @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor03rules0.JournalEntryPage.03movement000000]{Movement}. In addition, he adds +4 to damage when leaping as part of a @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor03rules0.JournalEntryPage.03wildattack0000]{Wild Attack} instead of the usual +2 (unless in a closed or confined space where he cannot leap horizontally or vertically—GM’s call).

Low Light Vision.name: Low Light Vision
Low Light Vision.description: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-racial-abilities.Low Light Vision]{Low Light Vision} (1): The being ignores penalties for Dim or Dark @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor03rules0.JournalEntryPage.03illumination00]{illumination} (but not Pitch Darkness).

No Vital Organs.name: No Vital Organs
No Vital Organs.description: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-racial-abilities.No Vital Organs]{No Vital Organs} (1): These species have hidden, extremely tough, or redundant vital organs. @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor03rules0.JournalEntryPage.03calledshots000]{Called Shots} do no extra damage against them.

Skill.name: Skill
Skill.description: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-racial-abilities.Skill]{Skill} (1/skill): The character starts with a d4 in a @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor01charac.JournalEntryPage.01traits00000000]{skill} inherent to her race. For 2 points (or 1 if already a core skill), it starts at d6 and the skill’s maximum increases to d12+1.

Pace.name: Pace
Pace.description: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-racial-abilities.Pace]{Pace} (2): The character’s @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor03rules0.JournalEntryPage.03movement000000]{Pace} is increased by +2 and his running die is increased a die type.

Parry.name: Parry
Parry.description: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-racial-abilities.Parry]{Parry} (3): The creature’s natural @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor01charac.JournalEntryPage.01characters0000]{Parry} is increased by +1. This may be due to a prehensile tail, extra limbs, enhanced reflexes, or even latent psi-sense.

Poisonous Touch.name: Poisonous Touch
Poisonous Touch.description: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-racial-abilities.Poisonous Touch]{Poisonous Touch} (1): With a successful @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor03rules0.JournalEntryPage.03touchattack000]{Touch Attack}, bite, or claw, the victim must roll @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor01charac.JournalEntryPage.01traits00000000]{Vigor} or suffer the effects of @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor04theadv.JournalEntryPage.04poison00000000]{Mild Poison}. For 3 points the poison can be upgraded to Knockout, Lethal, or Paralyzing instead, but each use causes the hero @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor03rules0.JournalEntryPage.03fatigue0000000]{Fatigue}. The character may always choose whether or not to use her poison touch.

Poor Parry.name: Poor Parry
Poor Parry.description: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-racial-abilities.Poor Parry]{Poor Parry} (3): These beings are poor melee defenders; –1 @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor01charac.JournalEntryPage.01characters0000]{Parry}.

Power.name: Power
Power.description: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-racial-abilities.Power]{Power} (U): The race has an innate ability that functions like a @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor05powers.JournalEntryPage.05powers00000000]{Power}. For 2 points, she has @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor05powers.JournalEntryPage.05arcanebackgr01]{Arcane Background (Gifted)} and a power that reflects her unusual ability. Each time this is taken after the first costs 1 point and grants another power. It does not increase her Power Points—use the @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-edges.Power Points]{Power Points} edge for that.

Reduced Core Skills.name: Reduced Core Skills
Reduced Core Skills.description: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-racial-abilities.Reduced Core Skills]{Reduced Core Skills} (5): This race starts with one less @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor01charac.JournalEntryPage.01traits00000000]{core skill}. The skill may be gained normally but does not start at a d4. This may be taken once per core skill affected.

Reach.name: Reach
Reach.description: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-racial-abilities.Reach]{Reach} (3): Long limbs, tentacles, etc. grant the creature @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor02gear00.JournalEntryPage.02reach000000000]{Reach} +1 (add +1 each time it’s taken after the first).

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-racial-abilities.Regeneration]{Regeneration} (1): The being heals damage quickly. She may make a @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor03rules0.JournalEntryPage.03healing0000000]{natural healing} roll once per day (rather than every five days). For 3 points, @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor03rules0.JournalEntryPage.03damageeffect00]{permanent injuries} may be recovered once all other @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor03rules0.JournalEntryPage.03damageeffect00]{Wounds} are regenerated. Treat each injury as an additional @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor03rules0.JournalEntryPage.03damageeffect00]{Wound} for purposes of recovery (the being may try once per week).

Racial Enemy.name: Racial Enemy
Racial Enemy.description: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-racial-abilities.Racial Enemy]{Racial Enemy} (U): This species dislikes another species relatively common to the setting. They suffer a –2 penalty to @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.Persuasion]{Persuasion} rolls when dealing with their rivals and may become hostile with little provocation. This may only be taken once per race.

Environmental Resistance.name: Environmental Resistance
Environmental Resistance.description: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-racial-abilities.Environmental Resistance]{Environmental Resistance} (U): The species receives a +4 bonus to resist a single negative environmental effect, such as @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor04theadv.JournalEntryPage.04heat0000000000]{heat}, @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor04theadv.JournalEntryPage.04cold0000000000]{cold}, lack of air, @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor04theadv.JournalEntryPage.04radiation00000]{radiation}, etc. Damage from that source is also reduced by 4.

Reduced Pace.name: Reduced Pace
Reduced Pace.description: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-racial-abilities.Reduced Pace]{Reduced Pace} (1): For –1 point, reduce @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor03rules0.JournalEntryPage.03movement000000]{Pace} by 1 and the running die a die type (d4 is reduced to d4–1). For –2 points, reduce Pace another 2 points and subtract 2 from @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.Athletics]{Athletics} and rolls to resist @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.Athletics]{Athletics} where movement and mobility are integral to the challenge (GM’s call).

Size +1.name: Size +1
Size +1.description: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-racial-abilities.Size +1]{Size +1} +1 (3): The creature is larger than normal. Each point of @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor03rules0.JournalEntryPage.03sizeandscale00]{Size} adds directly to Toughness and increases maximum Strength one step. Large species may have difficulty using equipment designed for more traditional humanoids. See Size and Scale and the @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor06bestia.JournalEntryPage.06sizetable00000]{Size Table}.

Size -1.name: Size -1
Size -1.description: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-racial-abilities.Size -1]{Size -1} (1): The entity is smaller than average, reducing its @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor03rules0.JournalEntryPage.03sizeandscale00]{Size} and @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor01charac.JournalEntryPage.01characters0000]{Toughness} by 1 (see the @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor06bestia.JournalEntryPage.06sizetable00000]{Size Table}).

Skill Penalty.name: Skill Penalty
Skill Penalty.description: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-racial-abilities.Skill Penalty]{Skill Penalty} (Once per Skill): The race suffers a –1 penalty to a very commonly used skill such as @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.Fighting]{Fighting}, @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.Persuasion]{Persuasion}, or even @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.Piloting]{Piloting} in a game focused on airplanes (the GM decides based on her campaign). If the skill is less common or only comes up in certain situations, the penalty is −2. For 2 points, the penalty is −2/−4 instead.

Skill Bonus.name: Skill Bonus
Skill Bonus.description: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-racial-abilities.Skill Bonus]{Skill Bonus} (1/2): Biological factors give the race a +1/+2 bonus when using a particular @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor01charac.JournalEntryPage.01traits00000000]{skill}. A race that emits pheromones, for example, might have a +1 bonus to @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.Persuasion]{Persuasion}.

Sleep Reduction.name: Sleep Reduction
Sleep Reduction.description: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-racial-abilities.Sleep Reduction]{Sleep Reduction} (2): The being needs half the normal amount of @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor04theadv.JournalEntryPage.04sleep000000000]{sleep} as humans. If taken a second time, the being never sleeps.

Super Powers.name: Super Powers
Super Powers.description: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-racial-abilities.Super Powers]{Super Powers} (1): The race has truly extraordinary abilities taken from the Savage Worlds Super Powers Companion. The cost is 2—for Arcane Background (Super Powers)—plus the actual cost of the power selected (X). Make sure you have the GM’s permission before taking this powerful ability.

Toughness.name: Toughness
Toughness.description: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-racial-abilities.Toughness]{Toughness} (3): The character has hardened skin, scales, or extremely dense tissue that increases his base @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor01charac.JournalEntryPage.01characters0000]{Toughness} by +1.

Wall Walker.name: Wall Walker
Wall Walker.description: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-racial-abilities.Wall Walker]{Wall Walker} (1): The species may walk on vertical surfaces normally, or inverted surfaces at half @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor03rules0.JournalEntryPage.03movement000000]{Pace}.

Environmental Weakness.name: Environmental Weakness
Environmental Weakness.description: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-racial-abilities.Environmental Weakness]{Environmental Weakness} (U): The race suffers a –4 penalty to resist a particular environmental effect, such as @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor04theadv.JournalEntryPage.04heat0000000000]{heat}, @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor04theadv.JournalEntryPage.04cold0000000000]{cold}, etc. If the being suffers an attack based on that form, the penalty acts as a bonus to @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor03rules0.JournalEntryPage.03dealingdamag00]{damage}.
